column1: Smoque BBQ////It's hard to find a good bbq place in Chicago
column2: and this one it just that. Their brisket is some of the best I've had yet. I don't like ribs so I've never had it
column3: but my boyfriend always gets it and loves it. The place can get pretty packed
column4: so don't plan on going during peak hours. Parking is decent
column5: we've always parked behind the place.
